artefact.overview: You need a licence to record or use television or radio broadcast material for non-commercial educational purposes
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to record or use television or radio broadcast material for non-commercial educational purposes.
artefact.licence_overview:
To record or use television or radio broadcast material for non-commercial educational purposes in an educational establishment, you need a licence from the [Educational Recording Agency (ERA).](http://www.era.org.uk/ "Educational Recording Agency (ERA)"){:rel="external"}

For Open University broadcasts a separate licensing scheme is in operation.
